subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] On PALM
msgSnippet: ... Hmm.  What dialect do you speak? ... Orthodox has its advantages. -- What asininity could I have uttered     John Cowan  that they applaud
messageBody:
Ron Cameron scripsit:

> Speak for yourself. In my dialect the "l" in palm, psalm, calm, balm, etc., is pronounced. :-)

Hmm. What dialect do you speak?

> With all these complexities regarding QS, it's a miracle we all ever learn to communicate with each other in the first place!

Orthodox has its advantages.

--
What asininity could I have uttered John Cowan <cowan@...>
that they applaud me thus? http://www.ccil.org/~cowan
--Phocion, Greek orator
